videos.description: No. 9 West Virginia is off to a fast start with a 10-0 run to start the game on the road against No. 3 Kansas
videos.headline: WVU jumps out to fast start with 10-0 run against Kansas

videos.description: Devonte' Graham prevents an easy fast break layup with a massive chase down block.
videos.headline: Kansas stops bucket with huge block in win

videos.description: Landen Lucas throws it down off the Josh Jackson miss.
videos.headline: Lucas throws down huge put back dunk

videos.description: Sviatoslov Mykhailiuk finishes the fast break off of a full court assist by Josh Jackson.
videos.headline: Josh Jackson full court pass sets up easy finish

videos.description: Dwight Coleby throws down a huge dunk off an offensive rebound.
videos.headline: Coleby punishes rim with big slam

videos.description: Jevon Carter knocks down the stright away 3-pointer to end the half.
videos.headline: Carter 3 gives WVU momentum heading into half

videos.description: Bill Self talks about the high level of play of West Virginia as well as his teams foul troubles and inability to play behind the trap.
videos.headline: Kansas head coach Bill Self talks about first half struggles

videos.description: The crowd at Allen Fieldhouse officially set a world record as the loudest crowd at an indoor sporting event.
videos.headline: Allen Fieldhouse sets world record for noise

videos.description: Tarik Phillip picks up a technical foul for pushing Josh Jackson during a dead ball.
videos.headline: Tempers flare as Phillip picks up Technical foul

videos.description: Josh Jackson finishes huge alley-oop from Devonte' Graham.
videos.headline: Jackson slams home high flying alley-oop

videos.description: Daxter Miles Jr. throws down with authority off the assist from Esa Ahmad.
videos.headline: Miles Jr. finishes back-door cut with style

videos.description: Landen Lucas throws down huge put-back dunk to cut into West Virginia lead.
videos.headline: Lucas dunk part of wild Kansas comeback to send it to OT

videos.description: Josh Jackson steal and Euro-step layup part of Kansas fast start in OT
videos.headline: Jackson Euro-step in overtime has Allen Fieldhouse rocking

videos.description: Postgame breakdown on Kansas' improbable comeback to force overtime against West Virginia in a 84-80 win.
videos.headline: Postgame breakdown on Kansas' improbable comeback

videos.description: Kansas guard Frank Mason III explains how the Jayhawks were able to storm back and beat West Virginia in overtime. Mason also talks about how important it will be if they win the Big 12 title for the 13th time in a row.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Interview (Frank Mason on OT win: 'We just kept fighting') 2017/02/13 SC

videos.headline: Frank Mason on OT win: 'We just kept fighting'
